title: Caching
short_description: Caching, leveraging tools like Redis, accelerates access to files by storing copies in a temporary location, enhancing retrieval speed.
detailed_description: Caching, leveraging tools like Redis, accelerates access to files by storing copies in a temporary location, enhancing retrieval speed.

title: Logging
short_description: EFK(elasticsearch , fluentd, kibana) stack aggregates logs from hosts and applications which can be visualized in Kibana.
detailed_description: EFK(elasticsearch , fluentd, kibana) stack aggregates logs from hosts and applications which can be visualized in Kibana.

title: Messaging
short_description: Apache Kafka, a distributed streaming platform, facilitates real time message publishing and subscribing, enabling robust data streaming infrastructure.
detailed_description: Apache Kafka, a distributed streaming platform, facilitates real time message publishing and subscribing, enabling robust data streaming infrastructure.

title: Secret Management
short_description: Vault, a secure tool for secret management, enables developers to securely store and dynamically generate sensitive data like passwords and tokens.
detailed_description: Vault, a secure tool for secret management, enables developers to securely store and dynamically generate sensitive data like passwords and tokens.

title: Encryption-Decryption
short_description: UbiQ facilitates secure data transfer between sources through encryption and decryption processes.
detailed_description: UbiQ facilitates secure data transfer between sources through encryption and decryption processes.

title: License Management
short_description: KeyGen, part of License Management service, generates unique license keys for software to enable controlled access and usage based on authorized permissions and terms.
detailed_description: KeyGen, part of License Management service, generates unique license keys for software to enable controlled access and usage based on authorized permissions and terms.

title: Alarm Management
short_description: Alarm Management is a service that centralizes the storage of alarms originating from various sources and of different severity levels.
detailed_description: Alarm Management is a service that centralizes the storage of alarms originating from various sources and of different severity levels.

title: Distributed Tracing
short_description: Jaeger is an open-source distributed tracing system used for monitoring and troubleshooting microservices-based architectures.
detailed_description: Jaeger is an open-source distributed tracing system used for monitoring and troubleshooting microservices-based architectures.

title: Policy Engine
short_description: A policy engine is a software component that enforces rules or policies within a system or application.
detailed_description: A policy engine is a software component that enforces rules or policies within a system or application.

title: Metrics Engine
short_description: A metrics engine is a tool that collects and analyzes data to generate performance indicators and insights, aiding in decision-making and optimization processes.
detailed_description: A metrics engine is a tool that collects and analyzes data to generate performance indicators and insights, aiding in decision-making and optimization processes.

title: Backup and Restore
short_description: Backup and restore is a data management process where copies of important files or systems are made to protect against data loss.
detailed_description: Backup and restore is a data management process where copies of important files or systems are made to protect against data loss.

title: Notification
short_description: Notifications are alerts or messages sent to users to inform them about relevant events, updates, or actions within a system or application.
detailed_description: Notifications are alerts or messages sent to users to inform them about relevant events, updates, or actions within a system or application.

title: Configuration Management
short_description: Configuration Management is the process of systematically handling changes to a system's configuration in a way that maintains integrity over time
detailed_description: Configuration Management is the process of systematically handling changes to a system's configuration in a way that maintains integrity over time

title: Workflow Engine
short_description: A workflow engine is a software tool that automates and manages the flow of tasks, data, and processes within an organization, streamlining operations and improving efficiency.
detailed_description: A workflow engine is a software tool that automates and manages the flow of tasks, data, and processes within an organization, streamlining operations and improving efficiency.

title: Kube State Metrics
short_description: Kube State Metrics is a Prometheus exporter that provides metrics about the state of Kubernetes clusters.
detailed_description: Kube State Metrics is a Prometheus exporter that provides metrics about the state of Kubernetes clusters.

title: Log Shipper
short_description: A log shipper for Kubernetes pods collects and forwards logs generated by pod containers to a centralized location for storage, monitoring, and analysis.
detailed_description: A log shipper for Kubernetes pods collects and forwards logs generated by pod containers to a centralized location for storage, monitoring, and analysis.

title: Apache Storm
short_description: Apache Storm provides real - time stream processing capabilities for analyzing and processing Kubernetes logs at scale.
detailed_description: Apache Storm provides real - time stream processing capabilities for analyzing and processing Kubernetes logs at scale.

title: Katana Slice Manager
short_description: Katana Slice Manager is a tool for orchestrating and managing resource allocation and workload distribution within a Kubernetes cluster, optimizing performance and resource utilization.
detailed_description: Katana Slice Manager is a tool for orchestrating and managing resource allocation and workload distribution within a Kubernetes cluster, optimizing performance and resource utilization.

title: TOSCA Orchestartor
short_description: TOSCA Orchestration is a tool for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of complex applications using the TOSCA standard.
detailed_description: TOSCA Orchestration is a tool for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of complex applications using the TOSCA standard.

title: IPAM
short_description: IP Address Management (IPAM) is a system for planning, tracking, and managing IP addresses on a network to ensure efficient and organized allocation.
detailed_description: IP Address Management (IPAM) is a system for planning, tracking, and managing IP addresses on a network to ensure efficient and organized allocation.

title: Application LCM
short_description: ALM is the process of managing the entire lifecycle of an application, from its initial planning and development through deployment, maintenance, and eventual retirement.
detailed_description: ALM is the process of managing the entire lifecycle of an application, from its initial planning and development through deployment, maintenance, and eventual retirement.

title: NFV Orchestrator Service
short_description: NFV Orchestrator Service is a component of NFV that manages the deployment, scaling, and orchestration of VNFs within a network infrastructure.
detailed_description: NFV Orchestrator Service is a component of NFV that manages the deployment, scaling, and orchestration of VNFs within a network infrastructure.

title: Istio
short_description: Istio is an open-source service mesh platform that enables you to connect, secure, and manage microservices across a distributed system.
detailed_description: Istio is an open-source service mesh platform that enables you to connect, secure, and manage microservices across a distributed system.

title: Edge Proxy (Envoy)
short_description: Envoy is a high-performance edge proxy and communication bus designed for cloud-native applications, providing advanced load balancing, observability, and security features.
detailed_description: Envoy is a high-performance edge proxy and communication bus designed for cloud-native applications, providing advanced load balancing, observability, and security features.

title: Vitess
short_description: Vitess is an open-source database clustering system for horizontal scaling of MySQL through sharding, providing features like automatic sharding and transparent failover.
detailed_description: Vitess is an open-source database clustering system for horizontal scaling of MySQL through sharding, providing features like automatic sharding and transparent failover.
